name: Seek Help
text: Give to the Marc Spector player. You may flip to Marc Spector. Choose: . Discard Steven Grant and Jake Lockley from the [[IDENTITY]] stack → remove Seek Help from the game. . Take 2 indirect damage → discard this obligation.

name: Bushman
text: Forced Interrupt: When Bushman would be defeated, if there is no madness counter here, heal all damage from Bushman and put a madness counter on him instead. Bushman gets +2 ATK if there is a madness counter here.

name: Mano a Mano
text: Bushman is hellbent on defeating Marc Spector. Deescalate the situation quickly! Moon Knight and Mr. Knight get -1 ATK.

flavor: "This one will serve as a lesson to the others!"
name: Cull the Weak
text: When Revealed: Discard the ally you control with the least remaining hit points. If you cannot, take 2 damage instead.

name: Bushman's Knife
text: Attach to Bushman, if able. If you cannot, attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points. [star] Attached character's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend a resource → discard this card.
